name: Titanium Graveyard
description:
This Game was a project was designed and created in 48 Hours, for the 2020 Global Games Jam. The Theme that was tasked to create for this year was the theme of 'Repair'. From initial discussions with my team of 5, including me, to writing ideas on the blackboard we can around to the idea of a fun physics game that uses the theme of 'Repair' to repair a derelict and very damaged ship to progress from room to room. 

You play as the engineer raiding a Titanium Graveyard, a collection point for derelict space rigs. You need to fight against both gravity and hostile invaders as you repair the craft, hoping to fly it free.

Dev Team & Credits to:

Aaron Drinkwater,
Elliot Martin,
Jacob Carr,
Isobel McNeany, 
Natalia Pietrzak.

Further Instructions
